questions.title: Frollo is here to help you!
questions.display_text: We aim to personalise every experience. So we can provide you with meaningful financial direction, please let us know why you are here. I am here to...

answers.display_text: Find out where my money goes
Get support in paying off debt

questions.title: How do you feel about your finances?
questions.display_text: This let' us understand the level of support we should give you to keep you on the right track.

answers.title: NEEDS FIXING
answers.display_text: Always feel overwhelmed and I am always worried about money.

answers.title: NOT GREAT
answers.display_text: Often feel overwhelmed and I worry about my money.

answers.title: OK
answers.display_text: I know enough but need to put things into practice. Sometimes I worry about money.

answers.title: GOOD
answers.display_text: I feel comfortable about my money situations and rarely I worry about money.

answers.title: GREAT
answers.display_text: Have mastered my finance and never worry about money.
